Package Controller

Class CreateAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
Controller.CreateAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CreateAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class Controls the GUI for creating an updating appointments.
Version:
1.0, September 26th, 2022
Author:
Mike Fasnacht, mfasnac@wgu.edu

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the GUI for creating or updating appointments. The GUI changes depending on the status of the updatingAppointment boolean.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • saveAppointmentBtn

      public void saveAppointmentBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Saves changes to either create or update an appointment. If creating takes the current entries in all fields and creates a new Appointment Object in the program and also in the database, if any fields are entered correctly, does nothing and shows an Alert If updating verifies valid data entry before modifying the appointment object and pushing changes to the database
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • cancelAptCreationBtn

      public void cancelAptCreationBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Method to cancel current create or update operation. Simply shows a dynamic alert consistent with updatingAppointment to confirm cancellation and prevent loss of data entry accidentally. also resets the boolean and Appointment object pointer.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionCustomerSelection

      public void onActionCustomerSelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method tied to Customer combo box selection. this onAction method sets the text in the connected textField to the ID of the selected object in the comboBox.

    • onActionUserSelection

      public void onActionUserSelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method tied to the User combo box selection. this onAction method sets the text in the connected textField to the ID of the selected object in the comboBox.

    • fillContactList

      private void fillContactList()
      Method to fill the Contact String list. This fill method populates the ComboBox selection

    • fillCustomerList

      private void fillCustomerList()
      Method to fill the Customer String List. This fill method populates the ComboBox selection.

    • fillUserList
